attributes.action: Hand Avro Vulcan bomber XH 558 over to the Battle of Britain Memorial flight.
attributes.background: Hand Avro Vulcan Bomber XH 558 over to the Battle of Britain Memorial flight for future generations to enjoy.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Avro Vulcan bomber XH558 is owned and operated by Vulcan to the Sky Trust, an independent charity.
